Content: I have been trying to work out hwo to have an oraclenotify for Alrights chat dapp

Content: but it seems there is no place where oracles are called from an event in the code, they are all requested from an RPC so it only works with polling.

Author: blackjok3r#3181

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: I have a functio on komodo_connectblock

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: that updates the current ERA and notary R address array

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: so that each notary can identify itself, and other code has access to a list of notary address's that are active currently

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: and don have to always search through each staked array and convert thepubkey to R address every single time its needed.

Content: as i found early implementations were calling hthe staked_era and is_STAKED funciton thousands of time per second 😂
